vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Gad living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Gen.46.16;
son of: Gad (H1410);
brother of: Haggi (H2291), Shuni (H7764), Ezbon (H0675), Eri (H6179), Arod (H0720) and Areli (H0692); also called Zephon at Num.26.15;
Group of tsiph.yon (צִפְיוֹן "Ziphion" H6837)
§ Zephonites = see Zephon "treasure"
descendants of Zephon, the son of Gad
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
洗分族 这个專有形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 見 洗分 "財富"
迦得的兒子洗分的後裔(民 26:15)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
洗分族 这个专有形容词在希伯来文的意思是 见 洗分 "财富"
迦得的儿子洗分的后裔(民 26:15)
